plays.text: Goal scored by JIM CAMPBELL assisted by Kyle Calder and STEVE PASSMORE
Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for High Sticking Stephane Yelle
Penalty to Phil Housley 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Bob Probert assisted by Peter White and Ryan VandenBussche
Penalty to Brian Willsie 2 minutes for Roughing JIM CAMPBELL
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht unassisted
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jaroslav Spacek
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Roughing Mark Bell
Penalty to Kyle Calder 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Eric Daze assisted by Alex Zhamnov and Steve Sullivan
